description:
90 FIVE-STARS | 50 AWESOME REVIEWS | ACTUAL RESULTS

Fully Updated with Facebook Ads System Changes [2015]

>>See The Reviews Before you Buy<<

"This is a great course. I was able to implement some of the tools and even ask Mawy for help. What he shared was instrumental in my testing out a couple of different ads and learning how to tweak in order to get the desired result. This is definitely a course you should take if you want to add Facebook marketing to increase exposure to your target market base."

Dr. Taffy Wagner

Facebook Secrets -My unbiased review
I have watched many courses on Udemy, some good..some bad! This course was very well presented and uncovers some real golden nuggets to help you get better results from your Facebook ad campaigns. If you have done any Facebook or PPc advertising you will soon realise the value of this training. The presenter highlights some really important information regarding setting up campaigns, retargeting and ad spend. Get this wrong and it will hit you in the pocket - I know...I've been there. If you are new to Facebook Advertising please do yourself a big favour and take this course and then thank me later for the information you receive. Most courses of this nature are all about selling T Shirts and other stuff but this training sets you on the right path without risking losing your shirt... or... you're T Shirt for that matter! Thank You

Nick Roberts

- Are you burning your cash on Facebook advertising or other online digital ads with very low conversions?

- Do you want to spend less on advertising while getting more and better leads?

- Are you wondering how Digital Advertising Agencies are doing it?

Waste No More Time, and Learn How To:

Drive leads that converge to buyers 7 times in just 2 days with Facebook advertising and marketing pro techniques and create Facebook ads like experts do.. - Get an aggregated of a Proven Workable Roadmap of more than 10 years of experience with customers’ online advertising campaigns and Facebook Marketing and Advertising.

[This course will pay for itself in the first couple of days of your new campaign..]

You will be able to:

  • Create 10X cheaper ads for your business and your clients

  • Work as Digital advertising Agency

  • Work as a consultant

Master Facebook advertising tools and learn how to create a perfect target audience groups that are most interested, capable and willing to buy your product and target them with Facebook ads.

  • Learn how to create ultra cheap and super impact and leads-converging Facebook ads..
  • Learn how to setup your Facebook marketing plan and setup your Facebook Advertising winning road map..

Have you tried Facebook advertising before, and the results were not as desired?[ Make sure your check the "DISCUSSIONS" section for actual Use-Cases ] You may have got some “Likes” and poor engagement with couple of comments and no shares, and obviously no one converged to a real customer or bought anything from you or even opted in to your email list… Probably you pushed the limit with the budget hoping to get better results and it didn’t end up well as you hoped.. Many.. many marketers, online advertisers, and business owners are getting the same results and are wondering if it really works for them. In fact, long time when I started my first online business, way before I became a digital marketing consultant, I struggled as much and my campaigns were just a failure after another.. My CTR was roaming around 0.03 - to 0.05, and I was getting low quality audience who would never spend a dime on any of my products… I was wondering if it doesn’t really work, how come others are still doing it? Over the years, I learned how create the most successful and savvy Facebook campaigns, at a real low cost.. This course is an aggregate of my years of experience doing successful campaigns for my business as well as my clients.

BONUS: "Facebook Quick Ads Generator" Free

After you take this course, you should be able to:

  • Run your campaigns effectively
  • Throttling down your budget multiple folds while getting the same amount of clicks or engagement you desire based on your KPIs
  • Attract your best desired customers
  • Generate better converging and buyers leads
  • Run campaigns for customers as an advertising agency

The course is mainly constructed of video step by step tutorials and instructions. It starts with essential knowledge to make sure that we are all on the same page and making our steps upwards to the professional and expert level. The course starts with Basic Knowledge about Facebook advertising;

  • Why use Facebook advertising
  • Getting introduced to how the ads tool is structured,
  • Type of ads, and when to use each one
  • Ads placements and best practices

Then moving to the next level:

  • Calculating CTR and Critical CTR
  • CPM and CPC and when to use each and best practices
  • Solving performance problems of running campaigns
  • Mastering bidding and Budgeting

Third Level

  • Better Audience targeting
  • Getting better leads and boosting convergence rate
  • How to use Facebook Audience Insights effectively
  • how to use Power Editor actively even for small campaigns
title: Facebook Marketing & Advertising Secrets to 10X leads [2015]
